video.title: 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ
video.synopsis: One day, Madoka Kaname has a very magical encounter, one that can change her destiny. This is the beginning of the new story of magical witch girls.

episodes.synopsis: Eighth-grader Madoka experiences an odd dream and goes to school the next day, only to learn there's a new girl in her class -- a girl from her dream.
episodes.title: I First Met Her in a Dream... or Something

episodes.synopsis: Madoka and Sayaka find themselves in a desperate situation and are rescued by Mami Tomoe, a magical girl. Afterward, Mami invites them to her house.
episodes.title: That Would Be Truly Wonderful

episodes.synopsis: Madoka and Sayaka are getting used to Mami's witch hunting trial run, yet their wishes remain undecided. Mami reveals her past to the two girls.
episodes.title: I'm Not Afraid of Anything Anymore

episodes.synopsis: After the fierce battle they witnessed, Madoka and Sayaka now fully realize the demands of being involved in the magical world.
episodes.title: Miracles and Magic Are Real

episodes.synopsis: Now that Sayaka's wish came true by making a contract with Kyubey, her mind is clear and she doesn't seem to regret becoming a magical girl.
episodes.title: There's No Way I'll Ever Regret It

episodes.synopsis: Homura intervenes in the battle between Sayaka and Kyoko. The next day, Sayaka and Madoka search for traces of the familiar that slipped away.
episodes.title: This Just Can't Be Right

episodes.synopsis: Sayaka, in low spirits, wavers between the wish that came true by accepting the destiny to fight and the high price she paid for it.
episodes.title: Can You Face Your True Feelings?

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to healing magic, Sayaka can fight without a scratch. But she seems extremely exhausted. On the way home, Madoka comments on Sayaka's fighting.
episodes.title: I Was Stupid... So Stupid

episodes.synopsis: A Grief Seed hatches, and a new witch emerges. With Homura's help, Kyoko is able to escape the witch's labyrinth while carrying Sayaka.
episodes.title: I'd Never Allow That to Happen

episodes.synopsis: The timid new girl is so nervous and withered. She introduces herself shyly while feeling the eyes of all students in the class.
episodes.title: I Won't Rely on Anyone Anymore

episodes.synopsis: Kyubey appears in front of Madoka, who is consumed by grief. Not understanding her emotions, he tells the history of the human race and of his kind.
episodes.title: The Only Thing I Have Left to Guide Me

episodes.synopsis: Madoka appears in front of Homura, full of determination -- and she declares to Homura, "I found my wish." But what will be her decision?
episodes.title: My Very Best Friend
